publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-601 Donald Gorrie: Water and Sewerage Charges-That the Parliament believes that the Scottish Executive's current water and sewerage charges reduction scheme should be extended in scale, scope and time and that the gap between the Income Support Allowance for water and sewerage and the actual level of charges should be progressively closed.

S2M-601 Donald Gorrie: Water and Sewerage Charges-That the Parliament believes that the Scottish Executive's current water and sewerage charges reduction scheme should be extended in scale, scope and time and that the gap between the Income Support Allowance for water and sewerage and the actual level of charges should be progressively closed.
S2M-601 Water and Sewerage Charges (lodged on 13 November 2003) Nora Radcliffe*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-601 Water and Sewerage Charges (lodged on 13 November 2003) Robert Brown*
S2M-601 Water and Sewerage Charges (lodged on 13 November 2003) Rosie Kane*
